entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SharedTypeQueryRelationalTestBase does not delimit identifiers in raw SQL #25661
    type-bug, area-test
  • [Cosmos] ISO date time strings are not read back correctly from the database #25656
    customer-reported

Closed

  • OwnsMany projection exception: The given key 'EmptyProjectionMember' was not present in the dictionary #22089
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, punted-for-5.0, 6.0.0
  • Query with CTE not working #21134
    closed-could-not-reproduce, customer-reported, area-query
  • LINQ query works in 3.1 and fails in 5.0 rc1: ArgumentException: Argument types do not match #22758
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Processing of the LINQ expression 'GroupByShaperExpression ... RelationalProjectionBindingExpressionVisitor' failed #21446
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Select expression throws an System.InvalidOperationException: 'EF.Property called with wrong property name.' #21490
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Column 'x' is invalid in the select list because it is not contained in either an aggregate function or the GROUP BY clause.' #21036
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Convert node introduced to upcast IPAddress.Loopback causes translation failure #21159
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Improve exception message for invalid pre-convention configurations #25521
    type-bug, area-perf, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2
  • Pre-configuration value conversion for struct doesn't work for nullable properties of the struct #25416
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2
  • Exploring Scoped vs Transactional (`IDbContextFactory`) `DbContexts` #25653
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • InvalidOperationException when removing an entity which shares a non-nullable foreign key with a related entity #21426
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-change-tracking, 6.0.0-preview7

Updated

  • Projection of Owned entities and aggregation in same query fails with System.InvalidCastException / System.ArgumentException #24133
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Contains on a readonly collection throws InvalidOperation exception. #18658
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Dependency issues between visitors #20445
    type-bug, area-query, punted-for-5.0, Risky
  • Cosmos: bad exception for queries with aggregate selecting non-mapped type #20677
    type-bug, area-query, area-cosmos, cosmos-query-refactor
  • Concurrency state issues with split query #25225
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query
  • [Cosmos] Objects sometimes corrupted and mutated in memory on DbContext.Set<T>().Add call #25560
    customer-reported
  • "Possible null reference return" in auto-generated compiled model #25647
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0
  • ValueConverter does not work well with HasData #21558
    type-bug, area-type-mapping, 6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Add regression test for #24133 #25672
  • Query: Add regression test for #18658 #25671
  • Fix #25225 by forcing usage of renting and populating commands when using relational command cache #25668
  • Remove unused nullability in typeof #25664
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25663
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • More links to conceptual docs #25658
  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655

Merged

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25670
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: Clone shaped query expression during translation #25634
  • Query: Don't expand include on entity reference which will be convert… #25585
  • Query: Throw better error message for grouping parameter without comp… #25666
  • Query: Add regression test for #21490 #25667
  • Query: Add regression test for #21036 #25669
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25665
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Support value conversion for ReadOnlyIPAddress #25587
    auto-merge
  • Apply pre-convention configuration to nullable instances #25638
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25662
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #25660
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25659
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25657
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Linking more conceptual docs from API docs #25618

Updated

  • Fix Cosmos update exception wrapping #25651
  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #25652
